basics.name: Adel Rodríguez
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: I'm a Software Engineer based in Santo Domingo, Dominican Republic. Most of my experience has been on the web, mostly on the Frontend, lately doing Fullstack. I love to learn new technologies and love developing simple and clean solutions to complex problems. I work mostly with Typescript, React and Node.js, although I dabble with Python and Go.

work.name: The Listing
highlights: Service allowing users to create gift registries aggregating products from multiple stores across Santo Domingo.
Built using Remix as a custom storefront and Shopify to manage the e-commerce backend.
Created a web scraping service using Playwright to extract product information from dozens of different stores.
work.summary: Creating a new gift-giving experience in the Dominican Republic. Personalized registry pages for weddings, baby showers, bachelorette parties, birthdays, and more.
work.location: Santo Domingo, Distrito Nacional, Dominican Republic

work.name: Tally
highlights: Led migration of the company codebases into a monorepo setup using pnpm workspaces and turborepo.

Shipped long-requested features such as: number formatting for number fields on forms, signature verification and custom HTTP headers on webhooks, discard not published changes, new options for conditional logic.
Fixed bugs such as performance on submissions view of forms with multiple images.

work.name: G2i Inc.
highlights: Contract developer focused on developing solutions to complex problems using React, React Native, Node.js, and GraphQL.
Developed web applications for hosting digital events using React and Firebase under strict deadlines.
Maintained and improved clients’ codebases across various technologies (Hugo, Grow, Angular as some examples).
work.summary:
Part of the G2i community. Contract developer focused on developing solutions to complex problems using React, React Native, TypeScript, Node.js and GraphQL.

• Developed web applications using React and Firebase.
• Performed maintenance work on clients' codebases, made with a variety of technologies such as Hugo, Grow, and Angular.
• Worked on accessibility refactors for high-traffic websites.

work.name: Synthesis
highlights: Shipped features to increase student networking: chat for student cohorts, SMS notifications for classes using Twilio, follow system for students and teachers, and student profiles.
Rewrote the subscription system, simplifying it and decoupling it from Stripe, solving issues charging customers and helped Operations team solve outstanding year long issues.
Integrated E2E testing into the CI workflow with Playwright and Docker.
Optimized CI workflow, reducing test times from 9 to under 4 minutes.
Contributed to Play, an event-driven system using Apache Kafka and XState.
Maintained and enhanced the student Portal using Next.js, TypeScript, and TypeORM.

work.name: Nanos - AI Marketing
highlights: Enhanced the ad creation wizard by encouraging users to rely more on the suggestions provided by the ML algorithm.
Worked with the Facebook Marketing and Google Ads APIs, initiating the migration from the AdWords API to the new Ads API.
Collaborated with external partners to transform the product into a whitelabel service, working closely with developers outside the organization to ensure successful implementation.
Performed extensive refactoring and bug fixing across the company’s legacy codebase, migrating old front-end components to newer React standards.

work.name: Left Field Labs
highlights: Developed web applications and Chrome Extensions using React, Preact, and TypeScript with strict time constraints for time-sensitive digital events.
Collaborated with product teams to enhance accessibility and localization across client projects.

work.name: Genome Digital
highlights: Led teams of 3-4 developers in creating web and mobile applications with React and React Native.
Implemented technologies to streamline development workflow (Storybook, Apollo GraphQL, TypeScript).
Maintained and updated legacy applications and codebases.
work.summary: Developed web and mobile applications using React and React Native.

work.name: OnClick Studio
highlights: Developed SPAs and APIs for clients' projects using MERN stack.
Deployed microservices to support the company's main product.

work.name: Ecolab
highlights: Designed and prototyped new products for the company's Material Process Delivery department.
Worked closely with RD&E Product Managers, MPD Project Leaders and Process Engineers to develop tooling for New Product Introductions (NPIs).
Fulfilled design requirements to support sustaining engineering tasks for seven plants in two facilities (La Romana and Las Americas).
Supported Process Engineers and Quality Engineers with new tooling designs for Kaizen projects.
work.summary: Prototype Design Engineering duties  at the Material Process Delivery (MPD) Department, responsible for designing tools (sealing dies, cutting dies, fixtures, templates) for the manufacture of surgical equipment and patient drapes.

work.name: CoworkingDo
work.summary:
• Assisted with daily tasks, customer support and maintaining the community of the coworking space.
• Part of the organizing team for Aceleración ALPHA, the first pre-acceleration program for startups in the Dominican Republic.

work.name: Instituto Tecnológico de Santo Domingo
work.summary: • Designed procedures for standardization of core functions within the IT department of the university.

volunteer.summary: Providing career development and developer health mentoring for the G2i Mentorship Program.

I'm a certified, paid expert for Toggl Hire, creating questions for technical skills like JavaScript, React, and Git. My questions are used in skills tests taken by thousands of candidates every week. This is my way of helping employers screen candidates based on ability and skill, not resumes.

highlights: Tech Champ 2020-2021

volunteer.summary: Coach for Startup Weekend Fintech Santo Domingo 2019
Staff for Startup Weekend Santo Domingo 2014.
Digital Presence Assistant at PYMES Digital.

projects.name: Wordbrush
projects.summary: Elevate your content with stunning visuals created directly from your writing. Create beautiful images for your blog, social media, or novel in seconds, using AI.
